verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: tweeted] [ARG1: a picture and link] [ARGM-TMP: Monday night] [C-ARG1: to a proclamation declaring May 15th as Peace Officers Memorial Day and May 14th through the 20th as Police Week] ...
